atk-s0511a4:1_0: Dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati parinibbute tassa sāsanaṁ vassasatasahassaṁ pavattittha.
atk-s0511a4:1_1: Atha buddhānubuddhānaṁ sāvakānaṁ antaradhānena sāsanampissa antaradhāyi.
atk-s0511a4:1_2: Athassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyamatikkamitvā ekasmiṁ kappe koṇḍañño nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0511a4:1_3: So pana bhagavā soḷasaasaṅkhyeyyaṁ kappānañca satasahassaṁ pāramiyo pūretvā bodhiñāṇaṁ paripācetvā vessantarattabhāvasadise
atk-s0511a4:1_4: attabhāve ṭhatvā tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā devatānaṁ paṭiññaṁ datvā
atk-s0511a4:1_5: tusitapurato cavitvā rammavatīnagare sunandassa nāma rañño kule sujātāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṁ paṭisandhiṁ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a4:1_6: Tassapi paṭisandhikkhaṇe dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṁse vuttappakārāni dvattiṁsa pāṭihāriyāni nibbattiṁsu.
atk-s0511a4:1_7: So devatāhi katārakkhasaṁvidhāno dasannaṁ māsānaṁ accayena mātukucchito nikkhamitvā sabbasattuttaro uttarābhimukho
atk-s0511a4:1_8: sattapadavītihārena gantvā sabbā ca disā viloketvā āsabhiṁ vācaṁ nicchāresi –
atk-s0511a4:2_0: Tato kumārassa nāmakaraṇadivase nāmaṁ karontā “koṇḍañño”ti nāmamakaṁsu.
atk-s0511a4:2_2: Tassa kira tayo pāsādā ahesuṁ – rāma, surāma,
atk-s0511a4:2_4: Tesu tīṇi satasahassāni nāṭakitthīnaṁ naccagītavāditakusalānaṁ sabbakālaṁ paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a4:3_0: So pana jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvā ājaññarathena nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā dasa māse padhānacariyaṁ cari.
atk-s0511a4:3_1: Koṇḍaññakumāraṁ pana pabbajantaṁ dasa janakoṭiyo anupabbajiṁsu.
atk-s0511a4:3_2: So tehi parivuto dasa māse padhānacariyaṁ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sunandagāme samasahitaghanapayodharāya
atk-s0511a4:3_3: yasodharāya nāma seṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṁ paramamadhuraṁ madhupāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā phalapallavaṅkurasamalaṅkate
atk-s0511a4:3_4: sālavane divāvihāraṁ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye gaṇaṁ pahāya sunandakājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0511a4:3_5: gahetvā sālakalyāṇirukkhaṁ tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pubbadisābhāgaṁ oloketvā bodhirukkhaṁ piṭṭhito
atk-s0511a4:3_6: katvā aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṁ tiṇasantharaṁ santharitvā pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a4:3_7: mārabalaṁ vidhamitvā rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ visodhetvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṁ
atk-s0511a4:3_8: visodhetvā pacchimayāme paccayākāraṁ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā
atk-s0511a4:3_9: udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṁ vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā cattāri maggañāṇāni
atk-s0511a4:3_10: cattāri ca phalañāṇāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṁ pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṁ cha
atk-s0511a4:3_11: asādhāraṇañāṇāni sakale ca buddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā paripuṇṇasaṅkappo bodhimūle nisinnova –
atk-s0511a4:7_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṁ visaṅkhataṁ;
atk-s0511a4:12_0: Paññāpetuṁ gatī natthi, pattānaṁ acalaṁ sukha”nti. –
atk-s0511a4:13_0: Evaṁ udānaṁ udānetvā sattasattāhaṁ bodhimūleyeva phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe brahmuno ajjhesanaṁ paṭicca –
atk-s0511a4:13_1: “kassa nu kho ahaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyya”nti upadhārento attanā saddhiṁ pabbajitā dasa bhikkhukoṭiyo addasa.
atk-s0511a4:13_2: “Ime pana kulaputtā samupacitakusalamūlā maṁ pabbajantaṁ anupabbajitā mayā saddhiṁ padhānaṁ caritvā maṁ upaṭṭhahiṁsu,
atk-s0511a4:13_3: handāhaṁ imesaṁ sabbapaṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyya”nti evaṁ upadhāretvā –
atk-s0511a4:13_6: “tesaṁ dhammaṁ desetuṁ gamissāmī”ti pattacīvaramādāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
atk-s0511a4:14_0: Tasmiñca samaye tā dasa bhikkhukoṭiyo arundhavatīnagaraṁ upanissāya devavane viharanti.
atk-s0511a4:14_1: Te pana bhikkhū dasabalaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānasā paccuggantvā,
atk-s0511a4:14_7: Tatra koṇḍañño dasabalo munigaṇaparivuto buddhāsane nisinno tidasagaṇaparivuto dasasatanayano viya vimalagaganatalagato
atk-s0511a4:14_8: saradasamayarajanikaro viya tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando viya virocittha.
atk-s0511a4:14_9: Atha satthā tesaṁ sabbabuddhanisevitaṁ anuttaraṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dvādasākāraṁ dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṁ
atk-s0511a4:27_0: Tattha dīpaṅkarassa aparenāti dīpaṅkarassa satthuno aparabhāgeti attho.
atk-s0511a4:27_4: Heṭṭhato avīci upari bhavaggaṁ tiriyato anantā lokadhātuyo etthantare ekapuggalopi tassa mukhaṁ oloketvā ṭhātuṁ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a4:27_7: Tassa hi bhagavato vassasatasahassāni yāva parinibbānasamayaṁ etthantare bhikkhuparisāya gaṇanaparicchedo nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0511a4:28_0: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṁ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0511a4:29_0: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a4:31_2: catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā mahāpathavī viya pakativātena lābhālābhaiṭṭhāniṭṭhādīhi akampanabhāvato “dharaṇūpamo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0511a4:32_3: Ñāṇena gaganūpamoti ettha bhagavato ñāṇassa anantabhāvena anantākāsena upamā katā.
atk-s0511a4:34_0: Buddhañāṇaṁ appameyyaṁ, na sakkā ete vijānitu”nti. ;
atk-s0511a4:35_0: Tasmā anantassa ñāṇassa anantena ākāsena upamā katāti.
atk-s0511a4:36_0: Indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggasaccappakāsananti etesaṁ indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggasaccānaṁ gahaṇena satipaṭṭhānasammappadhāniddhipādāpi gahitāva honti.
atk-s0511a4:36_1: Tasmā indriyādīnaṁ catusaṅkhepānaṁ vasena sattattiṁsabodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ pakāsanadhammaṁ pakāsesi,
atk-s0511a4:37_0: Tato aparabhāge mahāmaṅgalasamāgame dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatāyo sukhume attabhāve māpetvā imasmiññeva cakkavāḷe sannipatiṁsu.
atk-s0511a4:37_1: Tattha kira aññataro devaputto koṇḍaññadasabalaṁ maṅgalapañhaṁ pucchi.
atk-s0511a4:41_3: yadā pana bhagavā gaganatale titthiyamānamaddanaṁ yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ karonto dhammaṁ desesi tadā asītikoṭisahassāni arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu.
atk-s0511a4:46_0: Koṇḍañño kira satthā abhisambodhiṁ patvā paṭhamavassaṁ candavatīnagaraṁ upanissāya candārāme vihāsi.
atk-s0511a4:46_1: Tattha sucindharassa nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto bhaddamāṇavo nāma yasodharabrāhmaṇassa putto subhaddamāṇavo
atk-s0511a4:46_2: ca koṇḍaññassa buddhassa sammukhā dhammadesanaṁ sutvā pasannamānasā dasahi māṇavakasahassehi saddhiṁ
atk-s0511a4:47_0: Atha koṇḍañño satthā jeṭṭhamāsapuṇṇamāya subhaddattherappamukhena koṭisatasahassena parivuto pātimokkhamuddisi,
atk-s0511a4:47_2: Tato aparabhāge koṇḍaññasatthuno putte vijitasene nāma arahattaṁ patte taṁpamukhassa koṭisahassassa majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṁ uddisi,
atk-s0511a4:47_4: Athāparena samayena dasabalo janapadacārikaṁ caranto udenarājānaṁ nāma navutikoṭijanaparivāraṁ pabbājesi saddhiṁ tāya parisāya.
atk-s0511a4:47_5: Tasmiṁ pana arahattaṁ patte taṁpamukhehi navutiyā arahantakoṭīhi bhagavā parivuto pātimokkhaṁ uddisi,
atk-s0511a4:54_0: Tadā kira amhākaṁ bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma cakkavattī hutvā candavatīnagare paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a4:54_1: So kira anekanaravaraparivuto salilanidhinivasanaṁ sameruyugandharaṁ aparimitavasudharaṁ vasundharaṁ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena paripāleti.
atk-s0511a4:54_2: Atha koṇḍañño buddhopi koṭisatasahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto janapadacārikaṁ caramāno anupubbena candavatīnagaraṁ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a4:55_1: “sammāsambuddho kira amhākaṁ nagaraṁ anuppatto”ti sutvā paccuggantvā bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṁ saṁvidahitvā
atk-s0511a4:55_2: svātanāya saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena nimantetvā punadivase bhattavidhiṁ suṭṭhu paṭiyādetvā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhassa
atk-s0511a4:55_5: temāsaṁ mahājanasaṅgahaṁ karonto idheva vasathā”ti yācitvā tayo māse nirantaraṁ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa asadisamahādānaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0511a4:56_1: “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā dhammamassa desesi.
atk-s0511a4:56_2: So satthu dhammakathaṁ sutvā rajjaṁ niyyātetvā pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca
atk-s0511a4:56_3: ca abhiññāyo uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0511a4:71_0: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṁ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0511a4:99_0: Tameva atthaṁ sādhento, mahārajjaṁ jine adaṁ;
atk-s0511a4:107_0: Tattha ahaṁ tena samayenāti ahaṁ tasmiṁ samaye.
atk-s0511a4:107_2: Samuddaṁ antamantenāti ettha cakkavāḷapabbataṁ sīmaṁ mariyādaṁ katvā ṭhitaṁ samuddaṁ antaṁ katvā issariyaṁ vattayāmīti attho.
atk-s0511a4:108_0: Rājā kira cakkavattī cakkaratanānubhāvena vāmapassena sineruṁ katvā samuddassa uparibhāgena aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṁ pubbavidehaṁ gacchati.
atk-s0511a4:108_8: Evaṁ ovāde dinne taṁ cakkaratanaṁ vehāsaṁ abbhuggantvā puratthimaṁ samuddaṁ ajjhogāhati.
atk-s0511a4:108_10: tathā tathā saṁkhittaūmivipphāraṁ hutvā ogacchamānaṁ mahāsamuddasalilaṁ yojanamattaṁ oggantvā antosamuddaṁ
atk-s0511a4:108_11: ubhosu passesu veḷuriyamaṇibhitti viya paramadassanīyaṁ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a4:108_12: evaṁ puratthimasāgarapariyantaṁ gantvā taṁ cakkaratanaṁ paṭinivattati.
atk-s0511a4:108_13: Paṭinivattamāne ca tasmiṁ sā parisā aggato hoti,
atk-s0511a4:108_14: majjhe rājā cakkavattī ante cakkaratanaṁ hoti.
atk-s0511a4:108_15: Tampi jalaṁ jalantena viyogaṁ asahamānamiva nemimaṇḍalapariyantaṁ abhihanantameva tīramupagacchati.
atk-s0511a4:109_0: Evaṁ rājā cakkavattī puratthimasamuddapariyantaṁ pubbavidehaṁ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddapariyantaṁ
atk-s0511a4:109_1: jambudīpaṁ vijetukāmo cakkaratanadesitena maggena dakkhiṇasamuddābhimukho gacchati.
atk-s0511a4:109_2: Taṁ dasasahassayojanappamāṇaṁ jambudīpaṁ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddato paccuttaritvā sattayojanasahassappamāṇaṁ
atk-s0511a4:109_3: aparagoyānaṁ vijetuṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva gantvā tampi sāgarapariyantaṁ abhivijinitvā pacchimasamuddatopi
atk-s0511a4:109_4: uttaritvā aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṁ uttarakuruṁ vijetuṁ tatheva gantvā taṁ samuddapariyantaṁ katvā tatheva
atk-s0511a4:109_6: Ettāvatā raññā cakkavattinā sāgarapariyantāya pathaviyā issariyaṁ adhigataṁ hoti.
atk-s0511a4:110_3: Saha lokagganāthenāti saddhiṁ dasabalena koṭisatasahassānanti attho.
atk-s0511a4:110_6: Aparimeyyito kappeti ito paṭṭhāya satasahassakappādhikāni tīṇi asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā ekasmiṁ bhaddakappeti attho.
atk-s0511a4:111_1: Tameva atthaṁ sādhentoti tameva buddhakārakamatthaṁ dānapāramiṁ pūrento sādhento nipphādentoti attho.
atk-s0511a4:112_0: Imassa pana koṇḍaññabuddhassa rammavatī nāma nagaraṁ ahosi,
atk-s0511a4:112_3: bhaddo ca subhaddo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a4:112_5: tissā ca upatissā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a4:127_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a4:130_0: Yathā hi gaganamuḷūbhi, evaṁ so upasobhatha.
atk-s0511a4:135_0: “Sā ca atuliyā jinassa iddhi, ñāṇaparibhāvito ca samādhi;
atk-s0511a4:137_1: so buddhakāle ceva cakkavattikāle ca nibbattati, nāññadā.
atk-s0511a4:137_4: vicittā āsi medanīti ayaṁ medanī khīṇāsavehi ekakāsāvapajjotā vicittā paramadassanīyā ahosi.
atk-s0511a4:137_7: tārāgaṇehi gaganatalaṁ viya khīṇāsavehi vicittā ayaṁ medanī sobhitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a4:138_3: Koṇḍaññabuddhassa kira kāle parinibbāyamānā bhikkhū sattatālappamāṇamākāsamabbhuggantvā asitajaladharavivaragatā
atk-s0511a4:138_4: vijjulatā viya samantato vijjotamānā tejodhātuṁ samāpajjitvā nirupādānā dahanā viya parinibbāyiṁsu.
atk-s0511a4:141_0: “Na heva dhātuyo tassa, satthuno, vikiriṁsu tā;
atk-s0511a4:143_0: Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā samāgantvā sattayojanikaṁ sattaratanamayaṁ haritālamanosilāya mattikākiccaṁ telasappīhi udakakiccaṁ katvā niṭṭhāpesunti.
